Html: My husband tried optimizing his fury warrior and was told to equip a one-handed weapon in his main hand even though he has titan's grip. Right now he has Masterwork Elemtium Deathblade with a landslide enchant in his mainhand and a Jeklik's Smasher in is off-hand with no enchant. He is being told to equip a Horseman's Sinister Saber with landslide in his main hand. The Horseman's is a one-handed agility weapon. This doesn't seem to make sense.

Nobody can help you without you attaching the relevent character file.  There are just too many settings, talents, gear sets, options etc etc. that can affect things to be able to guess what might be causing it.
When you say the character file, do you mean the Battle Net link, like this http://us.battle.net/wow/en/character/perenolde/Bambino/advanced?

You can create an issue in the Issue Tracker here and can attach the actual Rawr file for the character.   This will show things like what options & buffs you have selected.   If we just load his character from armory it will be using our settings, not the ones you are using and having issues with.
